TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供与 Web 应用程序视图状态相关的失败的信息。

span.span: Provides Web-application view-state-related-failure information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据, 以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 当视图状态发生故障时, ASP.NET 将引发类型的事件。ASP.NET raises events of type when a view-state failure occurs. 此失败表示尝试使用其他密钥从另一台计算机篡改视图状态或重新使用视图状态。This failure indicates either an attempt to tamper with view state or its reuse from another machine with a different key. 相关审核事件代码为。The related audit event code is . > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下, 你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型, 并且将通过在 "配置" `healthMonitoring`部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生, 以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. ## Examples 下面是配置文件的摘录, 其中显示了如何配置来捕获视图状态故障。The following is an excerpt of a configuration file showing how to configure the to capture view-state failures. 为了完整性`provider` , 我们显示了和`eventMappings`部分的设置。For completeness we are showing the setup for the `provider` and `eventMappings` sections. 它们已默认设置。They are already set by default. 唯一需要做的就是为该`rules`部分提供设置。The only thing you need to do is to provide the setup for the `rules` section. 有关详细信息，请参阅`healthMonitoring`。Refer to `healthMonitoring` for more information. 若要生成视图状态错误, 请在浏览器中输入包含以下查询字符串的 URL:To generate a view-state error, enter a URL in your browser with the following query string: ``` ?__VIEWSTATEFIELDCOUNT=1&__VIEWSTATE=bogus ``` 如果输入了以下配置设置, 则 Windows 应用程序事件日志将捕获视图状态失败。The Windows Application Eventlog will capture a view-state failure, if you enter the following configuration settings. ``` // Configure the provider to process // the health events. // Configure the WebFailureAuditEvent // object to handle the Viewstate failures. // Configure the connection between the // application lifetime event object // and the provider that must process it. ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET health 监视系统在内部使用。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你永远不会使用它来实例化对象, 但你可以在实现继承自此类的事件类型时调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class.
